patterns: I have early fullness during meal

responses: You might suffer from indigestion Take 5 gm. crushed rhizome with salt or jaggery twice daily before meal.
You might suffer from indigestion Take 10 ml. juice of anaar, 1 gm. black salt or fried Jira powder with honey or sugar to hold inside mouth for sometime before food.
Take A pinch of powder with a piece of crushed ginger & rock salt should be taken before meal.
Take 5-10 ml. lemon juice with a pinch of salt and pepper before food.

patterns: I have a severe headache
I am suffering from headache
Suffering from headache
Give me the solution of headache
responses: Warm paste of adrak and soonth should be applied over forehead upto 3 times a day.
Dalchini to be rubbed with water on a rough surface & applied to forehead.
Roast some ajwain dry on a tawa. Tie it in a muslin bag and sniff frequently.
Extract 1 teaspoon each juice of tulsi leaves and bel flowers. Add 1 teaspoon honey. Take twice a day.
Tea made by boiling 1 teaspoon fenugreek seeds (methi dana), taken twice or thrice a day provides excellent remedy.

patterns: I have fever
I am suffering from fever
Suffering from fever
Give me the solution of fever
responses: Take 2 gm. pippali powder with honey twice daily.
Take 30 ml. decoction from handful of Tulsi leaves & 5 gm. Dhania thrice a day.

patterns: I have cold and cough
I am suffering from cold and cough
Suffering from cold and cough
Give me the solution of cold and cough
responses: Take 2-5 gm. powder of dry rhizome with jaggery thrice a day in divided doses. 10ml. decoction prepared from a piece of ginger every morning prevents recurrent attack of cold.

Take 20 ml. decoction prepared from. 5 gm. Dhania, 1 gm Methi seeds, little turmeric powder should be taken 2-3 times/day. Little elaichi powder with a tea spoon full of honey 3-4 times day. Even chewing elaichi (Not more than 3 per day) frequently is help full in dry as well as productive cough.

Take Warm decoction of 2 gm. jeera, 5 gm. Dhania, 1 gm. Haldi, 1 gm. Methi powder and little pepper should be taken with honey/sugar with lemon two to three times.Chewing few grains frequently helps in dry as well as productive cough.

patterns: I have acidity

responses: Drink coconut water 3-4 times a day.
Take a tiny piece of jaggery (gur) every hour and just keep it in the mouth and slowly suck it till acidity subsides
Chewing a piece of harad is an age old remedy.
The juice can be mixed with an equal amount of amla juice for better results. To take out amla juice , grate an amla and squeeze the pulp through a clean muslin cloth to get juice.

patterns: I have acne
I am suffering from acnes
Suffering from acnes
Give me the solution of acnes
responses: Clean face with cotton wool dipped in rose water 2-3 times a day.
Do not use soap. Orange peel is very good in the treatment of acne. Grind the peel with some water to a paste and apply on affected parts.
Crush a garlic(lasan) flakes and apply on the face, once or twice a day.
Grind some neem leaves with water to a fine paste. Apply on infected area.
Make a paste of half teaspoon each of sandalwood and turmeric (haldi) powder in a little water and apply.

patterns: I have Mouth ulcers

Suffering from anaemia
Give me the solution of anaemia
responses: Avoid drinking tea and coffee immediately after meals as the tannin present in these interferes in the absorption of iron from the food.
Take freshly prepared apple juice an hour before meals or just before retiring for the night.
Mix 1 tablespoon amla juice with a ripe mashed banana and eat 2-3 times a day.

responses: Thoroughly mix 2 teaspoons almond oil with 1 teaspoon rose oil. Rub gently on the chest, morning and evening.
Boil 1 teaspoon fenugreek seeds (methi dana) in one and half cups water. Strain and add 2 teaspoon honey. Take twice daily.

patterns: Liquid or pus leaks from the wound of animal bite

responses: Take half teaspoon ground black cumin seeds (shah jeera), twice daily.
Mix equal quantities of castor oil and lime juice. Massage the affected area with this mixture.
Drink 1 cup warm water mixed with lime juice and honey.

patterns: I am suffering from appetite loss

Suffering from physical weakness or fatigue and difficulty in concentrating

responses: Mix and powder equal quantities of carom seeds (ajwain), fennel seeds (saunf), dried ginger powder (sonth), salt and black cumin seeds (shah jeera).Mix a teaspoon of this powder and a teaspoon of hot ghee to cooked rice and eat frequently .
Take 2 teaspoon of amla juice and mix it with 2 teaspoon honey and 2 teaspoon lime juice. Add 1 cup water and drink on an empty stomach every morning.
Kali mirch Cut 1 piece ginger (adrak) into small pieces. Add one and half cups of water. Boil. Simmer for 2-3 minutes. Add milk and sugar to taste, and take it frequently like tea.

patterns: I am suffering from asthma
Difficulty in breathing and chest tightness
I have asthma
Suffering from asthma
Give me the solution of asthma
responses: Mix 1 teaspoon honey with half teaspoon cinnamon (dalchini) powder and have at night before going to bed.
Boil carom seeds (ajwain) in water and inhale the steam.
Boil 8-10 flakes of garlic (lasan) in half cup of milk. Have this every night.
Add a handful of drumstick leaves (sahijan) to 1 cup water. Boil. Simmer on lowflame for 3-4 minutes. Cool and strain. Add salt, pepper and lemon juice to taste. Have every day, once or twice a day.

patterns: I lost my hair

responses: Boil 1 cup mustard oil (sarson ka tel) with 4 tablespoon henna (mehendi) leaves. Filter and bottle. Massage on the bald patches regularly.
Grind the remains of tobacco smoked in a hookah and add to boiling mustard oil. Cool and store. Massage on the bald patches regularly.
Grind 1 tablespoon liquorice root pieces (mulathi) in 1 cup milk with one-fourth teaspoon saffron (kesar). Apply this paste on bald patches at bedtime continuously.

patterns: My child frequently make his bed wet

responses: Take 2 walnut halves (akhrot giri) and 1 teaspoon of kishmish before sleeping for 10-12 days.
Grind 2 teaspoon each carom seeds (ajwain) and dried ginger (adrak) into a fine powder. Add a little black salt (kala namak). Take 1 teaspoon of this mixture with 1 cup warm water frequently.

patterns: I have blackheads on my face
My face is full of blackheads

responses: Mix 1 teaspoon lime juice in 1 teaspoon finely ground cinnamon (dalchini) powder and apply on affected areas frequently.
Mix 1 teaspoon each turmeric (haldi) powder and juice of fresh coriander (dhania) leaves and apply daily as a face pack before going to sleep.

patterns: I am suffering from abdominal pain ,pressure

patterns: I have blood deficiency in my body

responses: Take 2 teaspoon of amla juice and mix it with two teaspoonfuls each of honey and lime. Add 1 teacup water and drink on an empty stomach every morning.
Soak 2 or 3 dried figs (anjeer) in 1 teacup water. Eat them along with milk next morning for a month.

patterns: I am suffering from body heat
Suffering from loss of consciousness and rapid breathing
Give me solution of body heat
responses: Add 2 to 3 drops of almonds oil to pomegranate (anaar) juice and drink.

Soak 8 to 10 almonds and 1 teaspoon rice overnight. Remove the outer skin. Grind into a fine paste. Mix with some milk and add a pinch of turmeric powder (haldi) and sugar candy (mishri) to taste.Boil and drink

Remove seeds from fresh amla fruits and grind the pulp into a fine paste. Tie it in a muslin cloth and squeeze out the juice. Take 2 teaspoon of this juice and mix it with two teaspoonfuls each honey and lime juice. Add 1 cup water and drink on an empty stomach every morning.

patterns: Suffering from body pain

responses: Boil 3 tablespoon powdered nutmeg (jaiphal) in 1 cup sesame oil (til ka tel). Cool and apply on affected parts.

responses: Slightly roast a big onion on a naked flame. Mash it and mix in teaspoon each turmeric powder and ghee. Apply and tie a bandage.
Mash the garlic (lasan) cloves and apply externally. Ground neem leaves into a paste and apply on affected parts.

patterns: My body swells

responses: Grind black cumin seeds (shah jeera) with a little hot water and apply on affected parts.

Sprinkle the following on a platter of mango slices : 1 teaspoon honey, a pinch of saffron (kesar), cardamom (chhoti illaichi) and rose water (gulab jal). Take twice daily.

Boil 3 tablespoon powdered nutmeg (jaiphal) in 1 cup sesame oil (til ka tel). Cool and apply on affected parts.

patterns: My child is suffering from bronchitis

responses: Mix 1 teaspoon oil of garlic (lasan) and 3 teaspoon honey and give a small amount three times a day to the child.

patterns: I burnt myself by hot water

responses: Apply mustard paste on the burned area and keep it covered with a damp cloth for 30 minutes. Then, apply a layer of ointment
Boil 1 cup neem bark (neem ki khal) in 4 cups water. Remove from fire and shake liquid. Apply the emerging froth on the affected area. Repeat several times and for several days.

patterns: Feeling pain on burns
My body burns
My hand burnt while working in kitchen
Suffering from body burns
Give me the solution of body burns
responses: If you have a minor burn, immediately place an ice pack on the burnt area for 10 minutes.

Mash a ripe banana and apply on burns. Bandage with betel leaves (pan ka patta).Combine 4 teaspoon each of lime juice, coconut oil and rub until the betel leaves mixture turns white. Apply on affected parts.
Apply curry leaves (kari patta) as poultices over affected areas. Spread a thin layer of honey over the burn and cover with a dressing. Repeat this regularly every two or three hours till it heals.
Apply mustard paste on the burned area and keep it covered with a damp cloth for 30 minutes. Then, apply a layer of ointment
Burns by fire Immediately apply glycerine on the burnt area.
Burn a handful of mango leaves to ashes and apply this on the affected parts.

Regularly intake garlic (lasan) cloves for a few days.

Regularly intake coriander (dhania) decoction made by boiling 2 teaspoon dry seed powder in 1 cup water. (Milk and sugar can be added to improve its taste. This could be a welcome substitute for tea or coffee.)

patterns: I have cough
Suffering from cough
I have bad cough
Give me the solution of cough
responses: Mix equal amounts of honey and ginger (adrak) juice. For better results warm the mixture a little & then have it. Have 1 teaspoon, 2-3-4 times a day.
Three pepper corns (saboot kali mirch) sucked with a pinch of black cumin (shah jeera) and a pinch of salt gives relief.
Mix 1 teaspoon pepper powder with 4 teaspoon gur (jaggery). Make small balls. Suck 3-4 balls/tablets during the day.
Mix equal amounts of pepper powder and sugar candy (mishri) by weight. Mix enough pure ghee to form small balls. Suck one ball/tablet 3-4 times a day.

patterns: I have fewer than three stools a week and hard,dry or lumpy stools
I am feeling that not all stool has passed
I think I have constipation
Suffering from constipation
Give me the solution of constipation
responses: Take a hot glass of water with 1 teaspoon honey and juice of half a lemon first thing in the morning and drink one litre of water first thing in the morning.
Soak 6-8 dates (khajoor) in a cup of water at night. Churn in the mixer in the morning & drink first thing in the morning.

Consume approx. 250-300 gms fresh grapes (angoor) every day. When not in season, soak 12-15 raisins (kishmish) in water and have them. Raisins should be soaked for 24-48 hours and eaten early in the morning. The water in which they are soaked should also be drunk.

patterns: My child have fewer than three stools a week and hard,dry or lumpy stools
I think my child have constipation
My child is suffering from constipation
Give me the solution of constipation for my child
responses: Soak 6-8 raisins (kishmish) in hot water (depending on the age). When cool, crush well and strain. When given routinely even to little infants, it helps to regulate bowel movement.

Consumption of 6-8 apricots (khurmani) a day or 2-3 cucumbers (kheera) a day or 1-2 bananas a day is also very useful.Whole wheat flour should be used and processed foods (maida, cheese, confectionery) should be avoided.

Taking 2-3 teaspoon of isabgol in milk or warm water either first thing in the morning or at bed time is very beneficial. Mix half teaspoon honey to half - one cup warm water and have it 2-3 times a day.

patterns: My baby have bright red face and a tight belly

responses: Boil a teaspoon of fennel seeds (saunf) in a cup of water. Boil for 2-3 minutes and keep it to cool for 15-20 minutes. Strain.
Add 1-2 teaspoon to every feed of milk of the baby. It helps cure colic.

patterns: I am suffering from muscular cramps
Suffering from frequently cramps

responses: Apply clove oil (laung ka tel) on the affected parts.

Wash with Shikakai or mild shampoo. Boil a handful of neem leaves in 4 teacups of water. After cooling and filtering use for rinsing hair

responses: Soak half a nutmeg (jaiphal) in 2 cups water for over 2-3 hours. Take 1 teaspoon of this infusion and mix in 1 cup fresh coconut water. Drink twice or thrice a day.

patterns: Suffering from dehydration
I have dry mouth, feeling thristy and tired and yellowish and strong smell pee

responses: Add one fourth teaspoon salt, 3 teaspoon brown sugar or ordinary sugar and 2 teaspoon lime juice to 1 cup of water, mix well and drink.

patterns: I am suffering from diabetes
I have itchy skin,blurry vision and weakness
Suffering from frequent urination and excessive hunger
Give me the solution of diabetes
responses: A tablespoon of amla juice mixed with a cup of fresh bitter gourd (karela ) juice and taken daily for 2 months will reduce blood sugar.
Take dry tender leaves of the mango tree in the shade. Powder and preserve them. Half a teaspoon of this powder twice a day in the morning and evening proves beneficial.
3-4 teaspoons juice of bitter gourd (karela), taken every morning on an empty stomach gives good results.
Coarsely powder fenugreek seeds (methi dana) and have 1-2 teaspoon in the morning everyday.
Eating 10 fresh fully grown curry leaves (kari patta) every morning for 3 months is said to prevent diabetes due to heredity factors.
Soak 2 teaspoon fenugreek seeds (methi dana) in 1 cup water at night. Drink this water first thing in the morning and preferably eat the seeds too.
Chew 8-10 basil (tulsi) leaves in the morning.

patterns: Give some guidelines for diabetic diet
Guidelines for diabetic diet
responses: Eat plenty of vegetables like lettuce (salaad patta), tomato and fruits. Use the following fruits and vegetables sparingly and with caution: banana, seedless grapes (angoor), cheeku, leechi, custard apple (sharifa), dry fruits, mango, raisins (kishmish), potatoes, jackfruit (kathal), carrots (gajar), peas (mattar), beans, sweet potato (shakarkandi), beetroot (chukandar). Foods rich in fibre should be preferred. Daily intake of calories should be restricted.Use proteins moderately. Milk & nuts intake to be restricted to the minimum whereas have plenty of curds and buttermilk (chhach). Avoid all refined foods & sweets. Drink 8-10 glasses of water daily.For diabetes, diet restriction & light exercise like walking is a must as this controls the sugar level. Grape fruit is a splendid thing in the diet of a diabetic. Have 3 fruits at a time, 3 times daily.

Mash 1 ripe banana along with a pinch of salt and 1 teaspoon tamarind pulp (imli ka guda). Take twice a day.
Drinking a strong cup of unsweetened black tea is very effective for stopping diarrhoea.
Peel an apple and shred it. Keep the shredded pieces in a plate for approximately 20 minutes until they turn brown in colour, and then eat them.
Take every night, 3 cloves of garlic (lasan), chopped and boiled in milk.

Make a paste of 1 green chilli along with 2 tablespoon lime juice and Â½ teaspoon camphor (kapur). Take one fourth teaspoon of this paste. 2 or 3 teaspoon coriander seeds (saboot dhania) soaked overnight in water and taken next morning with 1 cup buttermilk (chhach).
Mix tea and water and drink it.

patterns: I feel tired eyes always

responses: Lavender oil offers gentle relief for tired and strained eyes. Add a drop of lavender oil to 500 ml (two and half cups) of water and shake the solution well. Dip two cotton wool pads in the liquid, squeeze out the excess water and place one pad over each eye. If you wear contact lenses, they must be removed beforehand.

Having cracks in feet
Give me the solution of feet cracks
How can I treat sole cracks at home?
responses: Mix equal quantities of glycerin and lemon juice. Apply every night before going to bed. This mixture can be made and stored in a glass bottle.
Massage your feet with castor oil every night (in winters) for 2-3 minutes and then wear socks at night.
Grind equal amounts of neem leaves & turmeric (haldi). Apply on affected area.
Finely grind a handful of henna (mehendi) leaves. Add 2 tablespoon lemon juice and apply on the feet.
Mix the juice of bottle gourd (lauki) and sesame oil (til ka tel) in the ratio 4:1 and heat till all the moisture has evaporated. Bottle and use over cracked skin.

patterns: My feet stinks
I have a sweaty and stinky feets
Suffering from feet stinking
Give me the solution of feet smelling
How can I treat my feet smelling?
responses: Soak feet in strong tea for 20 minutes every day until the smell disappears. To prepare your footbath, brew two tea bags in 500 ml of water for 15 minutes and pour the tea into a basin containing two litres of cool water.

patterns: Having hard and flaky skin of foot
I am suffering from foot corns
Give me the solution of foot corns
responses: Tie a fresh slice of lemon over the corn (painful area) and keep it all night.
Massage castor oil on the corns every morning and night before sleeping. Massage for 2-3 minutes so that the oil gets absorbed. In 3-4 weeks the corns will disappear.
Mash 1-2 cloves (laung) & garlic (lasan) and tie over the corns. Keep overnight.

patterns: I am having scaly,peeling or cracked skin between the toes
I am suffering from athlete's foot
Suffering from itchiness,especially right after taking off shoes and socks
Give me the solution for athlete's foot
responses: Keeping your feet clean and dry is enough to discourage the growth of this fungal infection. Remember, it is infectious and you must keep and wash your shoes, socks and towel separately.
To soothe the broken areas of your feet, simply soak them for 10 minutes in a footbath of apple cider vinegar mixed with water.

patterns: I am feeling dullness and little fevereishness
Feeling dizziness and feverishness
Give me the solution of feeling feverishness
responses: Mix 1 teacup fresh lemon juice in tender coconut water and drink.

patterns: I am feeling pain in stomach and chest due to gas
I have a feeling of fullness and passes the gas frequently
Give me the solution of my gas problem
Suffering from gas
responses: Instead of wheat you can have rice or chapatis of maize, jawar or bajara.
Mix one fourth teaspoon dry ginger powder (sonth) with a pinch of asafoetida (hing).Make a paste of this and apply on the belly button.Avoid the food which make gas.

intents.tag: guidelines of a gas patient diet
patterns: Give me some guidelines for diet while having gas
Some suggestion for diet while suffering from gas
responses: Gas patients should avoid foods that are high in fat, sugar or starch. They should eat plenty of vegetables like spinach, cabbage, lettuce, etc.

Avoid heavy (fried), spicy food. Do not eat very large meals, instead eat small meals. Try to eat a little, every 2 hours, so that the gap between the meals is not too big. Do some exercise. Even a walk will do wonders.

patterns: Suffering from hair dullness and coarseness
I am having dull hair
Give me the solution of hair dullness and coarseness
How can I treat my dull hair at home?
responses: Grind fresh fenugreek leaves (methi) to a paste and apply the leaf paste over the scalp before a bath.

patterns: I have lossing my hair
Becoming bald due to hair fall
How can I stop my hair fall?
Give me the solution to stop hair fall
responses: Apply a little almond oil (badam ka tel) on scalp frequently and massage.
Take a handful of neem leaves and boil them in 4 cups water. After cooling and filtering, use the decoction for rinsing hair.

Mix equal quantities of dried curry leaves (curry patta), lime peel (nimbu ka chilka), Shikakai, fenugreek seeds (methi daana) & green gram (moong saboot) and grind them finely. Store and use as a substitute for soap or shampoo.
Apply fenugreek (methi) seeds, ground with some water and the paste on the head. Allow to soak at least for 40 minutes before washing. Use every morning for a month.

patterns: I am too young still my hair is stated greying
The colour of my hair is becoming grey
My hair turning grey in colour
Give me the solution for hair greying
responses: Wet a lemon half and rub lemon juice into the scalp well. Wash off after it turns dry.
Grind 1 tablespoon each, pulp of amla and lime juice. Massage this into the hair before going to bed. Wash it next morning.
Soak shredded ginger (adrak) in honey. Eat a spoonful every morning.

patterns: My hair becoming thin
Suffering from hair thinning
Give me the solution of hair thinning
responses: Bathe the hair in 1 cup coconut milk twice or thrice a week for a few months.

patterns: I am having a feeling of heaviness in my head
Give me the solution for head heaviness
How can I treat head heaviness
responses: Grind the fresh amla fruits into a fine paste and apply on affected parts.
Grind 2 to 3 cloves (laung) into a fine paste along with half teaspoon dried ginger (sonth) and apply on nose, forehead

patterns: I have shortness in breath and swelling in legs
My I am suffering from some heart problem
I feel a pain in my chest sometimes
Give me the solution of heart problems
I am suffering from heart problems
responses: Eat one fourth teaspoon asafetida (hing) along with one large raisin (kishmish) every day.
Regular intake of ripe bananas strengthens the heart.

patterns: My hiccups are not stoping
Irritated due to non stop hiccups
Suffering from non stop hiccups
Give me the solution of hiccups
responses: Drink half glass water, slowly.Keep a teaspoon of sugar in your month and suck slowly.
Hold your breath for 2-3 minutes.

Swallow half teaspoon mustard seeds (sarson) mixed with half teaspoon pure ghee. Grind 4 cardamom (chhoti illaichi) well. Boil it in two and half cups or half litre water. When about 1 cup water remains, remove from fire and sieve it through a muslin cloth. Let it cool. When warm, drink a glassful. Works like magic.
Suck 2-3 small pieces of fresh ginger (adrak). This helps in hiccups which keep occurring again and again.

patterns: Suffering from high blood pressure?
I have high BP
Sometimes my nosebleeds due to high blood pressure
Give me the solution of high blood pressure
responses: Restrict salt intake and drink plenty of fluids (at least 8-10 glasses of water daily) Drink curry leaves (curry patta) juice initially 3 times a day (1 glassful) for 1- 2 months and then reduce to only once in the morning. Have it on empty stomach. For taking out juice: fill your mixy with washed curry leaves, add 3/4 glass water.
Consumption of natural diuretics like coconut water, butter milk, coriander (dhania) juice (make from green coriander in the same way as curry leaves juice) is very beneficial.
Rest, relaxation and good sleep are effective in keeping B.P. under control. Drink coriander (dhania) juice made from fresh dhania (same way as curry leaves juices) 3 times a day.
